questions.question: What is the cardinality of an empty set?
How many edges does a complete graph with n vertices have?
What is the result of 2^0?
In combinatorics, what does n! (n factorial) represent?
options: The sum of integers from 1 to n
The product of integers from 1 to n
The quotient of n and its factorial
The difference between n and its factorial
questions.answer: The product of integers from 1 to n

questions.question: What is the number of vertices in a cube?
What is the negation of the statement 'If it is raining, then the ground is wet'?
options: If it is not raining, then the ground is wet
If it is raining, then the ground is not wet
It is not raining and the ground is wet
It is not raining and the ground is not wet
questions.answer: It is not raining and the ground is not wet

questions.question: How many bits are in a byte?
What is the binary representation of the decimal number 10?
What is the result of the expression 3! + 4!?
In set theory, what does the intersection of two sets represent?
options: All elements common to both sets
The power set of a set
questions.answer: All elements common to both sets

questions.question: What is the base case in recursive algorithms?
options: The case with the smallest input
The case with the largest input
questions.answer: The case with the smallest input

questions.question: In graph theory, what is the degree of a vertex?
options: The number of edges connected to the vertex
The weight of the edges connected to the vertex
The distance from the vertex to a reference point
The number of vertices adjacent to the vertex
questions.answer: The number of edges connected to the vertex

questions.question: What is the value of log₂(8)?
What is the result of 5 mod 2?
What is the binary representation of the decimal number 25?
How many edges does a tree with n vertices have?
What is the result of 2 + 2 × 2?
In logic, what does 'P → Q' represent?
options: P is not equal to Q

questions.question: What is the formula for calculating the number of combinations (n choose k)?
What is the sum of the first 100 positive integers?
